Review_title: Je Radhe She Chul O Badhe
Review_Text: I started watching Neel Mukut without any expectations whatsoever and in the end, its made me feel speechless! Laugh, Joy and Weep everything was in there. Docu-drama is a very new concept in Bangladesh, and I would love to get some more. Bangladesh is the biggest contributor to UN Peacekeeping Missions but sadly not too many people know about this. Neel Mukut was due for many years. Finally shout-out to all the UN Peacekeeper women of ours. Je Radhe She Chul O Badhe.
